paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant associated with hereditary transthyretin mediated amyloidosis (hATTR).

individual_records.phenotype_details: show a mutation in the TTR gene, which in the protein is translated by replacing Val for Met at position 30
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Individuals with hATTR show a mutation in the TTR gene, which in the protein is translated by replacing Val for Met at position 30.

functional_data.summary: The mutation leads to an altered TTR protein structure, causing more dissociation at the dimer-dimer interface than in the wild-type.

variants.segregation_data: Does segregate with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is specifically associated with hATTR.
key_quotes: Individuals with hATTR show a mutation in the TTR gene, which in the protein is translated by replacing Val for Met at position 30.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in the TTR gene was identified in the text.
